result.ga: an bhfuil gaeilge ag gach duine anseo
result.orig: an bhfuil gaeilge ag gach duine anseo
result.html: an bhfuil gaeilge ag gach duine anseoDoes everybody here speak Irish?
result.ponchtml: an ḃfuil gaeilge ag gaċ duine anseoDoes everybody here speak Irish?

result.eng: At first, I would like to welcome everybody.
result.ga: ar dtús ba mhaith liom fáilte a chur roimh gach éinne
result.orig: ar dtús ba mhaith liom fáilte a chur roimh gach éinne
result.html: ar dtús ba mhaith liom fáilte a chur roimh gach éinneAt first, I would like to welcome everybody.
result.ponchtml: ar dtús ba ṁaiṫ liom fáilte a ċur roiṁ gaċ éinneAt first, I would like to welcome everybody.

result.eng: He was the strongest and beat everybody else effortlessly.
result.ga: b'eisean an duine ba láidre acu agus sháraigh sé gach duine eile gan dua
result.orig: b'eisean an duine ba láidre acu agus sháraigh sé gach duine eile gan dua
result.html: b'eisean an duine ba láidre acu agus sháraigh sé gach duine eile gan duaHe was the strongest and beat everybody else effortlessly.
result.ponchtml: b'eisean an duine ba láidre acu agus ẛáraiġ sé gaċ duine eile gan duaHe was the strongest and beat everybody else effortlessly.

result.ga: go raibh maith ag gach duine a tháinig
result.orig: go raibh maith ag gach duine a tháinig
result.html: go raibh maith ag gach duine a tháinigThanks to everybody who came.
result.ponchtml: go raiḃ maiṫ ag gaċ duine a ṫáinigThanks to everybody who came.

result.ga: tá aithne agat ar gach éinne mar sin
result.orig: tá aithne agat ar gach éinne mar sin
result.html: tá aithne agat ar gach éinne mar sinYou know everybody, then?
result.ponchtml: tá aiṫne agat ar gaċ éinne mar sinYou know everybody, then?

result.ga: tá bua éigin ealaíne ag gach éinne
result.orig: tá bua éigin ealaíne ag gach éinne
result.html: tá bua éigin ealaíne ag gach éinneEverybody has some artistic talent.
result.ponchtml: tá bua éigin ealaíne ag gaċ éinneEverybody has some artistic talent.

result.eng: Everybody who was alive in 1963 says they remember exactly the point in time when they heard of President John F. Kennedy's assassination.
result.ga: deir gach éinne a bhí beo i 1963 gur cuimhin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar chuala siad faoi dhúnmharú an uachtaráin john f kennedy
result.orig: deir gach éinne a bhí beo i 1963 gur cuimhin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar chuala siad faoi dhúnmharú an uachtaráin john f kennedy
result.html: deir gach éinne a bhí beo i 1963 gur cuimhin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar chuala siad faoi dhúnmharú an uachtaráin john f kennedyEverybody who was alive in 1963 says they remember exactly the point in time when they heard of President John F. Kennedy's assassination.
result.ponchtml: deir gaċ éinne a ḃí beo i 1963 gur cuiṁin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar ċuala siad faoi ḋúnṁarú an uaċtaráin john f kennedyEverybody who was alive in 1963 says they remember exactly the point in time when they heard of President John F. Kennedy's assassination.

result.eng: Now now, you have everybody in the house confused with your stories.
result.ga: seo seo tá a bhfuil sa teach amú ag do chuid scéalta
result.orig: seo seo tá a bhfuil sa teach amú ag do chuid scéalta
result.html: seo seo tá a bhfuil sa teach amú ag do chuid scéaltaNow now, you have everybody in the house confused with your stories.
result.ponchtml: seo seo tá a ḃfuil sa teaċ amú ag do ċuid scéaltaNow now, you have everybody in the house confused with your stories.

result.eng: Everybody who ever died in this house.
result.ga: iomlán a bhfuair bás sa teach seo riamh
result.orig: iomlán a bhfuair bás sa teach seo riamh
result.html: iomlán a bhfuair bás sa teach seo riamhEverybody who ever died in this house.
result.ponchtml: iomlán a ḃfuair bás sa teaċ seo riaṁEverybody who ever died in this house.

result.eng: Everybody in the house said in unison.
result.ga: arsa bunadh an tí as béal a chéile
result.orig: arsa bunadh an tí as béal a chéile
result.html: arsa bunadh an tí as béal a chéileEverybody in the house said in unison.
result.ponchtml: arsa bunaḋ an tí as béal a ċéileEverybody in the house said in unison.

result.ga: nuair a bheadh an saol fá chónaí
result.orig: nuair a bheadh an saol fá chónaí
result.html: nuair a bheadh an saol fá chónaíWhen everybody was asleep...
result.ponchtml: nuair a ḃeaḋ an saol fá ċónaíWhen everybody was asleep...
